articles.author: Hyunjoo Jin, Abhirup Roy, Abinaya V
articles.title: Musk says Tesla shareholders voting yes for his $56 bln pay package - Reuters
articles.description: Tesla shareholders are voting to approve a $56 billion pay package for Elon Musk and to move the electric vehicle maker's legal home to Texas, Musk said on social media platform X on Wednesday, adding that passage was by wide margins.

articles.author: Sheila Chiang
articles.title: Chinese EV stocks surge after EU slaps up to 38% additional import tariffs - CNBC
articles.description: Hong Kong's Hang Seng index surged 1.23% at the open, powered mostly by gains in EV stocks.
articles.content:
Shares of Chinese electric vehicle makers mostly surged on Thursday morning after the European Union announced higher tariffs of up to 38% on Chinese EVs a day earlier.
Hong Kong's Hang Seng index s… [+3665 chars]

articles.author: Charley Blaine
articles.title: Fed officials' latest interest rate outlook may roil stocks - TheStreet
articles.description: The central bank can't see doing more than one rate cut this year. Meanwhile, stocks are starting to look pricey.
articles.content:
The conventional wisdom as markets closed on Wednesday was something like this: The Federal Reserve may cut interest rates only once this year.

articles.title: Elon Musk Sued in New Lawsuit Alleging Rampant Sexual Harassment at SpaceX - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Eight former SpaceX employees say they were fired by the company in retaliation for raising complaints about workplace issues.
